channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Leftists’ Victimhood And Narcissism Are Two Self-Obsessed Sides Of The Same Coin
item.description: If you think you're a victim, even when things are going well for you, then you're obviously spending too much time thinking about yourself.
